name: SynapseMX, Inc.
description: Developer of a cloud-based aircraft maintenance software designed to help teams to plan, track and accomplish aircraft maintenance. The company's cloud-based software minimizes the duration of maintenance events, improves management, provides real-time updates and operational insights from a simple interface on any device, enabling aircraft maintenance teams to streamline aircraft turnaround times during unscheduled maintenance works.
one_liner: Developer of a cloud-based aircraft maintenance software designed to help teams to plan, track and accomplish aircraft maintenance. The company's cloud-based software minimizes the duration of maintenance events, improves management, provides real-time updates and operational insights from a simple interface on any device, enabling aircraft maintenance teams to streamline aircraft turnaround times during unscheduled maintenance works.
